content: @Jared Baker is there a framework in place to request new Jupyter Lab extensions? I am working on a project which requires "@pyviz/jupyterlab_pyviz"
@Max Grover are you sure you need pyviz, I checked this extension is not required in hvplot any more.
It is still required in this case - we need the interactive widgets to talk to the kernel. I am using something other than hvplot (panel)
Just a normal Research Computing ticket is usually sufficient for added packages.
@Max Grover pyviz_comms and panel have been installed in the dev version https://jupyterhub.hpc.ucar.edu/dev/. Please test it out and let us know. Thanks
Thanks - the dashboard in that notebook works now!
